text: Egha Iesus mɨgɨa ghua ghaze, “Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ ia mɨgei, ia pamten uan ikɨrɨmɨrim gɨnɨghnɨghɨva, kamaghɨn azangan markɨ, e dagher manatamra damam, o e dɨpar manatamra damam? Egh ia pamten uan nivafɨzibagh nɨghnɨgh mɨkɨman markɨ, inir manatam uan nivafɨzim avam? Gumazimɨn ikɨrɨmɨrim ti daghebagh afira, ezɨ gumazimɨn namnam ti inibagh afira.
